Race.SpecificTitle: PW Law Enforcement District -- 1/2% S&U Tax Renewal - Sheriff - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Law Enforcement District Proposition 
(Sales Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Law Enforcement District of the Parish of Morehouse, State of Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to continue to levy and collect a sales and use tax of one-half of one percent (1/2%), for an additional period of ten (10) years, effective January 1, 2020 (the "Tax"), under the Uniform Local Sales Tax Law (estimated annual revenues: $1,500,000), with the net proceeds to be dedicated and used for the purpose of providing additional funding for the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Public Libraries -- 3.31 Mills Continuation - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Morehouse, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), under the authority of Article VI, Sections 30 and 32 of the Constitution of the State of Louisiana of 1974, and other constitutional and statutory authority, continue to levy and collect a special ad valorem tax of three and thirty-one hundredths (3.31) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $483,367 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for one entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2020 and ending with the year 2029, inclusive, for the purpose of constructing, maintaining, improving and operating public libraries in the Parish and for purchasing books, computers, furnishings and other library materials therefor, said tax to represent a 0.41 mill increase over the 2.90 mill tax authorized to be levied through the year 2019 pursuant to an election held on April 4, 2009, such increase having been effective beginning in 2012 due to reappraisal?
